alert.note: Alert for Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL WEST BATON ROUGE AND CENTRAL IBERVILLE PARISHES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Addis, or 7 miles northwest of Plaquemine, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plaquemine, Addis, and Brusly. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 142 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
